sections.content:
func TestOpenCreateFailure(t *testing.T) {
	t.Parallel()

	db, err := walletdb.Open(dbType)
	require.Error(t, err)
	require.Nil(t, db)

	db, err = walletdb.Open(dbType, "wrong")
	require.Error(t, err)
	require.Nil(t, db)

	db, err = walletdb.Create(dbType)
	require.Error(t, err)
	require.Nil(t, db)

	db, err = walletdb.Create(dbType, "wrong")
	require.Error(t, err)
	require.Nil(t, db)
}
